name: BaseAI (CommandCodeAI)
description: [项目级] BaseAI — The Web AI Framework. The easiest way to build serverless autonomous AI agents with memory. Start building local-first, agentic pipes, tools, and memory. Deploy serverless with one command.。来源: https://github.com/CommandCodeAI/BaseAI

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
BaseAI — The Web AI Framework. The easiest way to build serverless autonomous AI agents with memory. Start building local-first, agentic pipes, tools, and memory. Deploy serverless with one command.

来源: https://github.com/CommandCodeAI/BaseAI
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 1199

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: BaseAI is the AI framework for building serverless and composable AI agents with memory and tools. It allows you to develop AI agent pipes on your local machine with integrated agentic tools and memory (RAG). Visit our [BaseAI.dev/learn](https://baseai.dev/learn) guide to start with BaseAI.

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
CONTRIBUTING.md
DEPLOY
LICENSE
README.md
apps
apps/baseai.dev

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
OPENAI_API_KEY=
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=
COHERE_API_KEY=
FIREWORKS_API_KEY=
GOOGLE_API_KEY=
GROQ_API_KEY=
MISTRAL_API_KEY=
PERPLEXITY_API_KEY=
TOGETHER_API_KEY=
XAI_API_KEY=
```
